title: Kiwi-Kiwi Collection of Comix
description: An enchanting kid comic book, entirely hand-written and hand-drew by a nine-year-old from Singapore.Bursting with kid words and language, this delightful book captures the humorous misspellings commonly used by children. Get ready to embark on an adventure with the flying Kiwis, whose extraordinary ability to fly relies on "Kiwifroots." Join the flying Kiwis as they face thrilling adventures when their precious "Kiwifroots" vanish, their tree mysteriously disappears, and their beloved pool gets drained. Packed with engaging games and activities designed by a kid for kids, "Kiwi-Kiwi Collection of Comix" offers a joyful learning experience. Immerse yourself in this whimsical world and discover the magic of imagination.
author: Lam Dieu Phong
